website_summaries.verdict: Samsung closed the camera gap with rivals and created a top-of-the-line phone for people who want the best Android has to offer.
pros: The Galaxy Note 10 Plus delivers the premium goods, from a killer 6.8-inch screen and all-day battery life to excellent camera tools
cons: There's no headphone jack, which will disappoint long-time Samsung fans
The depth-sensing camera is extremely limited

customer_reviews.title: GOOD but not the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep this short, phone is great and all but moving from the Rog phone to this one is super hard, and this is mainly because the refresh rate 120 back to 60 is actually kind of straining on the eyes now ( eyes are kind of sensitive). Besides this everything else is great, oh and if you don't like the hole punch in the middle because of video watching there is like this semi full screen mode that just black bars the side and it's great, but 60hz on a $1200 phone hurts the soul.
customer_reviews.author: (Anon)

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, not great...box had been opened
customer_reviews.text: Slightly concerned as the box had been opened before getting to me. The phone seems to be new from everything I can tell, but that took some of my excitement away...not knowing for sure if someone had handled the phone prior to me. The sticker that is usually on the back of the phone was not present...you could see where it had been. The phone is quite nice, although not sure it's worth 1200 bucks. The camera is not really what the YouTube reviewers say it is...it does a lot of softening to faces...even with beauty mode turned off. Not sure if I'm keeping the phone after all of the above...still deciding.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed wasted hours on setup it defective I must return it.
customer_reviews.text: The phone was defective out of the box. I had spent hours on setup before I realized. I contacted Samsung support got a tech that knew less about the phone than I did grrr...hate that wasted my time and still didn't work. My S pen would not operate the camera. One of the features I upgraded for from the note 8. Basic features were fine it's a good phone but I bought it for a camera upgrade. Just a waste of time I just plan to return..what if the next one has another problem? Oh the pictures were not much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sierer

customer_reviews.title: 45W charging is bogus
customer_reviews.text: the phone looks amazing, however, the advertised 45W charging capability is misleading. only able to achieve 33w max. (with original samsung 45W charger)
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: No bundle
customer_reviews.text: The phone is amazing, but don't buy this with the bundle offer. The battery bundle never came, the box was open and amazon didn't care. Lost 70 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelly

customer_reviews.title: already open box.
customer_reviews.text: It was an open box. The protective stickers already contained dust. I will just keep it. Because product is okay. but I am very upset.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Small damage found after registration
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, however upon activation there is a small area where the pixels are damaged at the corner of the screen. Went unnoticed until after I got my phone set up at the store, small enough to not deal with not having a phone but large enough to be annoying. Can't return and go without a phone so I'm stuck with this. Update: the bottom half of the screen has now gone all within a few hours. Amazon is shipping a replacement but I now have no phone for 3 days while waiting on it to process.......
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Commercial fraud
customer_reviews.text: This version not dual sim but 4G version should come Dual Sim Wow even samsung Cheating us what I can say I am the stupid who left Apple to come to samsung
customer_reviews.author: ABDULAZIZ M.WALI

customer_reviews.title: Amazon preferred? Locked, registered to someone else and had a balance.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product. When we tried to install the Sim card, they said the product was already registered to another person and locked in a carrier. When I contacted Amazon to find out what was happening, they suggested it be returned right away. It was purchased as new and unlocked, but it was not, apparently. And it was an "Amazon preferred" purchase. So not sure what happened and now I have spent extra time on this phone and have to buy another one. Very strange experience.
customer_reviews.author: Orangedesert

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description - Says 512GB version is Dual Sim
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a dual-sim version with the biggest possible storage, and the product description says "Number of SIM - Dual-SIM; SIM size - Nano-SIM (4FF) ; SIM Slot Type - SIM 1 + Hybrid (SIM or MicroSD)". This is false and misleading. Especially for a product that is "ship from and sold by amazon". The phone itself is great, but I wanted a dual-sim of it, hence 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Damspele

customer_reviews.title: SELLER UNRESPONSIVE - REQUESTED REPLACEMENT
customer_reviews.text: How long should it take to review a replacement request? Since I got this phone, the moisture detection alert turned on although it was never immersed in water. I have used a cold air flow to attempt to dry the port out, and have also completed a factory reset on the phone as suggested on the internet. This is a new phone. I have filed a replacement from the seller and it sits in "review with customer service" - I need a dependable phone. Hopefully they are more responsive to bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Tsunamike

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. CHEATER!!!
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY. CHEATER!!! It says dual sim but it is just single sim. Per description: Number of SIM Dual SIM; SIM size Nano SIM (4FF) ; SIM Slot Type SIM 1 + Hybrid (SIM or MicroSD)
customer_reviews.author: NAVIN K.

customer_reviews.title: Not dual SIM & package was previously opened and broken seal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon's big lie!!!! These phones are not dual sim unlike what Amazon cliams!! Purchaed two they both arrived with previously opened seals, scratches and finger smudges
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Will NOT work with XFINITY Mobile...huh unlocked n bands are there COMCAST sez NOT COMPATIBLE....WHO is the liar????
customer_reviews.author: Sokski

customer_reviews.title: Open Box, all items fell out
customer_reviews.text: So my thousand dollar purchase arrived in an open box, it fell out of its original box because the tape was open and was being tossed all over the place. Everything came in pieces. The back of the phone is messed up either due to the phone flying all over the place inside the cardboard box, or someone touching it, I'm not sure. Either way, I'm getting it replaced, this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this device. As a power user gives me more than enough RAM, storage, and processing power. I've always thought that most smartphones are far overpriced when compared to the cost of production. It's due to the amount of money that is spent on advertising that inflates the cost. That's my only real complaint. There are a lot of hidden features that come in extremely handy. If you get this phone, take your time and go through the settings and enable the features that are best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it but got a bad one?
customer_reviews.text: Already contacted Samsung support. Love the phone but when cleaning with micro fiber a part of the back gasket came off. So no water proof in that spot(problem). Seems to be a manufacturer fault. Hopefully it is taken care of. I should return phone for a new one but seeing a recommended Samsung repair tech first.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Jensvold

customer_reviews.title: Samsung note 10+
customer_reviews.text: I have been relient on net 10+ and before on noted. The 10+ is faulty. they know it and tell me when fix is developed they will notify me and fix. I have waited 4 mo.
customer_reviews.author: taken again

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this phone. It's so pretty and it's super smooth to use. I mostly brouse the internet and stream movies. I'm upgrading from the Samsung Galaxy 9 and I'm glad I did. I can easily navigate presentations for my business. The camera is fantastic. I'm still playing around but I'd definitely recommend this phone. Also, I had no trouble turning it on with Metro by T-Mobile. I love a good phone but this company definitely gives the best value for multiple lines!
customer_reviews.author: Mxd Chx

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: I like the model of the phone but I am disappointed I arrive with a different box without accessories and the two corners pleads the cell paint and the system restarts pay for a device ah low price but it has many in the item I do not specify I need my money after xq I'm not happy with what happened to me ... thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pablo santana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with metro by t mobile sim
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work with my metro by t mobile sim card. It is mentioned in description that device is factory unlocked... Feel disappointed... Upd. Sorry guys, it does work with metro. But I did not find earbuds in the box :-(
customer_reviews.author: mukhtar

customer_reviews.title: Box was already tampered with and looked like a returned item.
customer_reviews.text: Box was already tampered with and looked like a returned item. I need a brand new which is what i paid for. The box seal itself was dirty and broken and phone almost slipped out of the box because of the seal.
customer_reviews.author: Binoj Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is infuriating!
customer_reviews.text: The phone is okay so far but it was difficult to get the SIM card holder out. To order the phone I had to sign in three times, each time Amazon required me to retrieve a password from my phone that was barely working!!!!!!!!!!!! I almost cancelled the next order for the same exact problem. I have been buying from Amazon for many years and my original password worked fine for at least ten years. TRY TALKING TO A HUMAN AT AMAZON, YOU WON'T LIVE THAT LONG. I'm looking for alternatives right so commit with suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Mcvay

customer_reviews.title: Best phone on the market!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature is the MST technology in Samsung Pay. It makes Samsung Pay work at locations that Tap to Pay normally wouldn't work. Everytime I use it, it blows people's minds.
customer_reviews.author: Colton Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Product malfunctioning in less then 90 days
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the phone. I have had it less 90 days when it malfunctioned in many different ways. I’m told I cannot exchange it for a new phone because the window period has expired. I have to wait for an appointment to be emailed to me in 24-48 hours before I can even get it repaired. I am in the healthcare business and can not be without a phone for days. So much for top of the line technology. It doesn’t matter if you purchased the cream of the crop with all the bells and whistles if the product malfunctions and Samsung isn’t willing to back up their product.
customer_reviews.author: andee skora

customer_reviews.title: Better than the S20+ for less
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this phone and a Galaxy S20+ at the same time and while the S20 is minutely faster in some tasks, its unnoticeable and the plethora of extra cool features you get with the Note make it a much better purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wrong listing as new. Came used!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not state used . Paid for new. Second time has happen buying Samsung products. Bought gear frontier s3. First came used with people's phone number.
customer_reviews.author: edward  dela pena

customer_reviews.title: MUCH different than the s9 plus (edge samsung).  this note 10.1 is WAAAAAY OVERRATED. BOOOOOO
customer_reviews.text: excellent phone/tablet hybrid... too many features... still going thru them. its an extremely business oriented phone... if i hadnt needed so much business stuff the s9plus edge wasnt handling i wouldnt have gone w the 10.1. i find i still need my s4 tablet for work and finer details on my art work. i hate HATE THE BIXBY BUTTON. DESPISE BIXBYVAMD ITS NEXT OF KIN CAN SUCK IT...TALKING TO ME IN CHINESE BC I LOOK ASIANISH! I'M 25%JAPANESE...DONT KNOW A WORD... but my rascIst BIXBY TOUCH PHONE LOOKS AT ME AND HAS BEEN DETERMINED TO SPEAK TO ME IN CHINESE SINCE I GOT IT. IF YOU WANT IMMERSION CHINESE, GET A PHONE W BIXBY AND TALK AT IT.
customer_reviews.author: the twisted knife

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a phone that was probably a refurb sold as a new phone. THERE WAS A SCREEN PROTECTOR ON IT WHEN I RECEIVED IT. didn't notice until after the return date. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: beefSmellington

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This phone was suppose to be a new Samsung Galaxy note 10. When I got it, it had house hold tape holding the box together. I turn the phone on and the screen that came on asked if I want to set the setting to factory settings, a new phone don't ask that! Highly disappointed at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Note 10 plus
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this phone!! The Aura Silver is so pretty but the fingerprints are a pain. The fingerprint sensor takes a minute to get used to but surprisingly it responds better than I thought it would. Getting a case for the fingerprint sensor to work is nearly impossible. At least it is for me. I may be doing something wrong though. The new s pen features are pretty cool as well. The camera is amazing. The only thing is if I send a video from text messages the quality is awful. Does anyone else have that issue?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: SCRATCHED!!!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was the screen was scratched in a few places... so returning it hoping to get a new one. I have a feeling it was used! Make sure you check the phone thoroughly before you give in. After the 2nd I will renew this review!
customer_reviews.author: James Steele

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!! LOW QUALITY & HIGHLY OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.text: Actually this phone is trash. My Samsung galaxy S6 is waaaaaaay better as compared to this. It looks like a cheap, beginning of the millennium, when they were still trying to figure out how to make the quality better. My Huawei P9 lite way way better. I feel like I've down graded. Way too overpriced. This does not even deserve a 1 star. Returning to sender thanx
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Fishy!
customer_reviews.text: Scam... .. Nothing!.. i got head phones a charger and radom packaging but found out there was a battery of some sort in bottom of box thats it . ...? Im speechless ....will not be buying again esp. Not used im done! Careful!
customer_reviews.author: Nice

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone about 3 months ago. Now the phone can no longer charge. Seems like the charging port malfunctioned. customer service said 30 days return period up. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Item NOT new
customer_reviews.text: USED PHONE, not new. Was missing the S pen. Box sealed with regular tape. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting more for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone but I guess i was expecting something more grandiose. Like apps and programs that no other phone had. thus far its just a phone. The Spen is nice when I remember its there. has a nice camera I use the phone for work so pictures come in real handy. I came over to samsung from the essential phone and I must say that I miss the essential phone. it has a newer android os and updates and it didnt cost me a mortgage payment
customer_reviews.author: drolson9

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what's worst.. the phone or the customer service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible phone. Bought it in October of 2019, I'm 6 months in and I just sent it back to Samsung for the 2nd time to be repaired. It takes 9-11 business days (Battery won't charge, says the temperature is to low) Their policy is repair, repair, replace within the year of purchase. So what's going to happen is it'll get past the year and I'll have a $1000 paperweight. As much as I hate to say it... Save yourself the headache and get an iPhone 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Landon Wolf

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this phone from here! when I went to the at&t store to have this phone added onto the plan, I was informed this is not an actual Samsung product. It could not even register the SIM card. It is a fraud product made in Vietname called a Huwai Huwai.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: Just about the closest you can get to a perfect phone today
customer_reviews.text: Despite what we now know about the new Note 20 and Note 20 Ultra, I feel that this Note 10+ continues to be the best phone you can get. Setting aside the S-Pen and its features, this phone is just so beautifully refined and more than capable. The shape of the display is perfect. Square in the corners. Not cutting into things on the screen like rounded corners do. SO easy to hold in the hand. I can't believe how thin it is. Not that I want a thin phone. Phones today are thin enough. I'm sticking with this phone until it dies. Just can't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: roaduardo

customer_reviews.title: I have to send it back!!!  WILL NOT WORK WITH BOOST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get it started especially after I read up on this from others and it said I could use it with boost just install your sim card. NOT I will probably have to buy a new one instead.
customer_reviews.author: SarahL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I paid $1100 for this and I still got bubble in my screen, I opened up the box and there were like carton pieces on top of the phone and there were fingerprints all over the phone. Also why doesnt the screen protector cover the the entire screen, kinda looked like my screen protector isnt for the note 10+ love the phone so far except for the bubble and how it was packed.
customer_reviews.author: Jr Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: They should quit bothering with earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great. Earbuds are pointless because they go quiet in one ear after a few months, same thing happened with my Galaxy Note 9 earbuds. They should just stop including them and stop "updating the firmware" for them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Christ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.. Amazon service doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy... The phone stopped working 5 months later after a software update, and Samsung doesn't want to fix, Amazon doesn't respond, nobody takes responsibility.. buy directly w Samsung or don't buy Samsung ..
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Nogueira

customer_reviews.title: Liked this more than anything
customer_reviews.text: Bought it through amazon bundle offer. We loved the phone very much. We were using samsung galaxy s9+ before and face recognition is really quick on this when compared to galaxy s9+. Camera really gives us the best quality pictures. Will recommend this as best offer that which they are providing and also best experience can be gained from this Note version.
customer_reviews.author: bpoosala

customer_reviews.title: Forces use of unwanted apps
customer_reviews.text: Bixby and other unwanted samsung apps are forced on you and no way to remove. I'm not in Wuhan, no more Samsung products for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: When my husband told me how much this phone was i freaked out because I'm a klutz and drop my phone on accident a few times so I was scared to break this on accident but so far it hasn't broke at all. This is what i have experienced: the camera and video quality is GREAT! No cracked or broken screen with phone case on by accidentally dropping it. No speakers blowing out by the volume being up really loud. Can store up a lot of storage and apps. Only thing I don't like is that on updates you need wifi and can't use data. So far I've been enjoying this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: It was used and not working correctly
customer_reviews.text: I was horrible that the seller allowed to sent a used phone for a new purchase order. It was also defective and with also someone password still in the phone.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Bad Samsung repair issues
customer_reviews.text: Phone charging port got hot and plug will not fit correctly only 2 months old. Samsung service not in all of upstate NY wants to mail phone for 7-10 days
customer_reviews.author: MykeyStacker

customer_reviews.title: Great phone but the fingerprint reader is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone that's for the Samsung line. But the only problem is the fingerprint reader is garbage. It's a complete a waste of time. It will not read your prints 90% of the time through multiple attempts. you're better off going directly through using your 4-Digit pin. Other than that it's an excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: IMEI doesn't work in every country!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ (unlock-phone) is definitely a perfect smart phone, I purchased it; but I had to return it since US Product Phones - such as this Note 10+ - will not work in Indonesia due to IMEI restriction and registration to the Office of Ministry of Communication and Information Technology Indonesia. So SAMSUNG, I am sorry for returning this US Product phone. If you guys try to purchase US product phones, please be aware that not every phone will work in every country, unless you keep SIM Card of your US provider with it and better to check it out with local provider prior to your International departure. Just an advise!
customer_reviews.author: Indonesia.1

customer_reviews.title: Ps4 controller support broken
customer_reviews.text: Yo Samsung I bought this new phone to get my game up and it cant even do what my 4 year old phone can. You gonna fix this ps4 controller issue? We all reporting the same thing and took the basic troubleshooting steps. What's wrong with you. Might have to refund this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone, but I'm a heavy gamer, movie watcher, and music player, I can burn the battery up in 4 hours! I'm a truck driver, and this phone IS my source of entertainment when running across the USA for YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone, bad source
customer_reviews.text: It a decent phone however, the fingerprint reader works maybe 50% of the time (and that is with having "2 fingers registered per finger". Also 3 months later and the phone will not charge. Overall, good phone bad quality source.
customer_reviews.author: RvnS

customer_reviews.title: Be AWARE!  Missing features!
customer_reviews.text: Unlocked phones are not always an advantage. There are several features disabled on the phone like VIDEO CALLING, that are provided on the regular network phones and there is no way of enabling them. THIS SHOULD HAVE BEEN PROMINENTLY indicated on the description. There is workaround for this but not a clean alternative. I would have expected to have features that were standard on my 3 year old S7. If you can live with this shortcoming, it is a nice phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Bamdad

customer_reviews.title: Amazon step up your game, you're becoming like Ebay smh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't have the original 4300mhz battery, mine had a 3300mhz and a lot of problems, not worth the hassle, smh, I can't believe Amazon allows this, it's making me more and more afraid to buy from Amazon , sad and angry, smh
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have this on Boost Mobile and I've noticed it is way less glitchy and problematic. It was a trial to get it switched to boost but most of that was the terrible customer service rep at the boost store who had no idea what she was doing. The camera is phenomenal. It's battery goes all day under heavy use with 1 charge. Calls are crystal clear speakers are lovely
customer_reviews.author: CorvetteLuci

customer_reviews.title: Never opened it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it not realized that it was not the S10+. (I had both on my cart!) I would have kept it, except that before I opened the case, I went to the local Best Buy to check it out, but realized that it was much larger than I would have liked it. I'm sure it's an awesome phone. Just wouldn't fit in my tiny purse :) Hence the 4-star rating. Just a bit too large for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cheddar

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Not even a year after getting this phone the wireless charging has stopped working all together. I've contacted Samsung since my phone is still under warranty and they explained that I would have to send my phone in for repair because there are no authorized repair shops near me. Meaning I HAVE TO GO 5 TO 10 DAYS WITHOUT A PHONE because of a MANUFACTURER DEFECT. I will NEVER buy another Samsung product after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Drewlaff

customer_reviews.title: Good! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's the product I bought of the function of this Note 10 but the fingerprint reader is not something I recommend. It's sloppy in reading, I much prefer not using it which bums me out cause I watched many reviews on youtube of the review and swiftness of the fingerprint reader. This is not something I would return the phone for, and it functions great still, so a five stars! Another note is, the phone gets glitchy if I try to split screen. Perks is that this phone came with a screen protecter, with earphones, charger. It came with a full package!
customer_reviews.author: avaj

customer_reviews.title: Love my notes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid note user for years now this is my 4th one! I really love them. The note 10+ is amazing the camera is stunning and the battery life is great! I really like how the fingerprint recognition was moved back to the front. The thing I dislike most is that samsung decided to follow in apple footsteps and decided to remove the headphone jack... super lame but everything else is great! Screen is amazing I love wat thing shows and movies with practically no bezel it is pretty much all screen!
customer_reviews.author: Cortni

customer_reviews.title: Not so happy.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I received a refurbished phone. Paid for a new one. Flickers on n off at times. Went to set up the phone and it asked me if my phone number was one I was unfamiliar with. Buy a refurbished one instead of paying for a new phone because chances are you probably will receive the refurbished phone.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Calorico

customer_reviews.title: Sent me an opened package?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received a new product or not. Phone packaging was opened. Nothing in the product information stated this was used. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: pjf

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone but it still has a birthmark... Bixby
customer_reviews.text: My Note 10+ is actually a great experience getting it unlocked. Not as loaded down with all the added apps that you can't remove. Samsung's has minimum. Only problem I have is Bixby. I can disable the button, but can't use it for what I want... Google assistant. Really?! I'm still determined to remove it when I swipe right on the home screen. Camera is still not as good as my Pixel 3xl, but I'm not complaining. Since I take photos of my rentals I didn't know how bad I needed the wide-angle lens.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a Samsung galaxy prime j7 to this beauty. It is such an upgrade and I couldn't be more in love. The first ger print reader is not that great but it could be because of my thick glass screen protector. The battery life is fantastic, and I love the fact I can share my phone batter with my galaxy buds case if its running low. I'm still learning about all the things this phone can do and I feel like each day I find something new. I adore my s pen, the camera makes every photo professional standard, and Bixby is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Leea H.

customer_reviews.title: Scamers and junk wont make it right ... dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware they send u defective items and wont give refunds they say u sent themn back a bad phone and then ur on the hook for 1k and they wont make it right all u get is forigners
customer_reviews.author: simon smith

customer_reviews.title: Factory seal broken on new phone. Maybe new who knows
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great but Amazon shipped it with the factory seal broken
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huffman

customer_reviews.title: If you have the Note 8 or Note 9 keep it don't upgrade to the note 10 unless you have no choice.
customer_reviews.text: My old Note 8 gets better 4G Signal and when I bought this Note 10 I thought it was the 5G. To me the description was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Upgrade Worth The Wait!
customer_reviews.text: I finally upgraded from my Note 5 because of limited space and battery life to this Note 10+. Oh my goodness, it was definitely worth the wait! It'll take me abit to adapt to all the new features, but I've got the time. I still have my Note 3! My daughter will likely inherit it when responsibly ready... lol. In the meantime, I'll just need to find economical screen protectors and the right sturdy case that doesn't compromise the rounded sides of the protector itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Think before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Although you might like the huge screen, its definitely not worth 1000 bucks. There are other phones which are worth a lot less but have better battery life and camera. This was my first samsung galaxy note and it was not as good as i expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Bibek Sapkota

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Too busy setting everything up and learning about the endless features to write much. And got the Amazon Warehouse deal. Love this phone. Totally worth it! Such a step up from the Galaxy J7 Prime, which was a pain in every way. Pictures comparing the two.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product -Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ Plus
customer_reviews.text: This "Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ Plus " very reliable super fast and pretty much configurable. We were able to load it with lot of heavy applications that we used at work. In addition feels like a mini TV and great to watch News, youtube etc The speakers are pretty good and sounds really loud ! It is a VERY EXPENSIVE PHONE. Thanks JG
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a little sceptical. I'm a die hard Huawei fan. Just wanted to give this Samsung a trial. I'm not disappointed. Battery outlasts my Huawei Mate 20x5g,which is pleasant surprise. Given what people complain about in Samsungs. I enjoy the pen remote operation of the camera for group selfies. Facial recognition works fine, even in low light.-Beats Huawei in this as well. My only complaint is the email app in Samsung is not my taste. I give to my Huawei.
customer_reviews.author: Raheem Seyi

customer_reviews.title: This phone freezes
customer_reviews.text: This phone keeps freezing. My previous one was the galaxy note 8 which was really freezing. I bought the note 10+ because I thought my note 8 was old but the same problem still continues with this new phone. I do ride share and when the phone freezes in the middle of a ride, it really frustrates me. With so much money spent, I feel like I should have tried something els.
customer_reviews.author: Donel#

customer_reviews.title: It's not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery life. I have to recharge it way too much. Also the GPS can be touchy and annoying. I think I'm going to go for the S20. Update: The screen scratches like crazy. I've never had a phone get so seriously scratched up as this one. I didn't buy a screen protector because I thought they'd use gorilla glass, like the pixel. But nope, this thing is scratched to hell.
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Best Price For "My" Choice of an S-10 Note Plus ☝️
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have made a better choice. I've had It for approximately 2 months and It's surpassed my expectations☝️ All my research Including "Specs" was my defining factor. The seller offers you a "Superior Product" at a very "Acceptable* price. In the future, I'll br checking with this" Seller" before I seek out I check elsewhere. They get a "Solid 5 🌟's from me.
customer_reviews.author: Frank here...

customer_reviews.title: Used/damaged
customer_reviews.text: This device came used with a scratch so deep to the screen that you could feel it with your fingers. Update they sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: JANET S.

customer_reviews.title: My Dad loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad loves it already and he has yet to activate it! Good first impression to him considering he had an iPhone 6s before I got him this phone. If it turns out to be defective I'll be sure to change this review, but until then: nice phone Samsung; well done!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great deal. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure where the poor reviews came from for purchasing this phone. The phone is stellar. It's fast, lots of storage, great camera, huge beautiful display. I received it without a single scratch or torn packaging. I move everything from my Note 8 in about an hour via smart switch sitting in my living room. No problems like some of the reviews I have read on this phone. Totally happy and it was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gwalker

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Wanted an upgrade from my OnePlus 6t, turns out I got a better camera an s pen an absolutely worst fingerprint reader, and the phone was from Vietnam not South Korea, but anyways I guess it's a fine phone but not much of an upgrade, but I will say The Price is Right
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful , easy working, essential  piece of  machinery.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this phone as I wanted something 5 G capable, not sure if that fact is possible, as it does not state that anywhere. However it is a beautiful piece. I cannot rate face or fingerprint capabilities as I do not have fingerprints. And facial is not for me. Battery is amazing, I have been able to use the phone all day doing many functions and the lowest the battery ever got was 67%. Beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Groombridge

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for its price
customer_reviews.text: overall the phone is absolutely amazing with new things that I've discovered everyday. It has beautiful display with HDR plus quality(meaning that videos on streaming platforms look beautiful). The camara quality is amazing and this phone is capable of handling lots of usage from different apps. Although the battery life runs out somewhat quickly, it has multiple options over battery saving. (Keep in mind that the stronger and faster you want your phone, the more battery life it will consume)
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Love the Galaxy 10 Note plus!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And, since the phone is unlocked, we have the option to go to any Cellular provider of our choosing. The Sim card was free from our Cellulr provider and we did not have to change our plan. The phone is awesome! I Love being able to use the pen to snap a picture remotely.
customer_reviews.author: cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend buying from amazon warehouse.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Galaxy Note 10+ and I was a little bit concerned because it was sold by Amazon warehouse. The only difference from a brand new phone was that the box was open before. Then, everything else was brand new. It costed me about $500 less than a brand new just because the phone was return and the box was open. I can't imagine a better place from where I can get such a discount just for that reason. The phone had no scratches, no malfunctioning, absolutely no issues.
customer_reviews.author: JeffLpezz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device; however, consider Galaxy S10.
customer_reviews.text: TLDR; excellent phone. Hot tip though... apparently the Samsung Galaxy S10 is cheaper and practically the exact same to the Note10. Marques Brownlee had a good video detailing that.. ;) Review: Upgraded from my Galaxy S8. The battery life is MUCH better; impressively so. The stylus is a fun tool. Screen is absolutely gorgeous. The front facing camera is a tiny on the screen weirdly. But it has never been in the way when watching videos to me. Great phone and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product as usual I have been a fan of Samsung since the 90s my first TV and VCR was Samsung and lasted me over 10 years with no issues I've had many great products from Samsung s5, tab pro, s8, now the note 10. I still have the tab pro still working the only issue is it doesn't upgrade past Android 4.4 but even still a great product and to be as old as it is still great battery life. And the reason I didn't put any stars for face recognition is never used is so can't write a review for something I've never used.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lyons

customer_reviews.title: make sure to get the 5g model
customer_reviews.text: i know i put three stars bc of the questions asked, but it's an amazing smartphone, the build quality is in a whole different league when compared to the note 9. sure the fingerprint scanner is unreliable but i love that its under display, and we all know how fave recognition is working rn... the battery life is actually pretty great. also its cool that it doesnt get hot. but tbh if you dont want the stylus id look at the s20 ultra 5g or if you do than the note 20 ultra now that its out.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying this unlocked by Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone, definitely worth the money. No third party proprietary junk in there from mobile carriers ie. Sprint/at&t/ Verizon... just good old Android OS
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but just to long.
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone but it's just too big. I have the S10+ and it's a good size but the note 10 is just to big and especially too long/tall.. I would get the thee smaller note 10 but it does not have an sd card slot.
customer_reviews.author: Rtech

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about this phone. It rips through every game and app that i use on it (Google maps has absolutely zero lag :D) . Massive hard drive you'll unlikely fill up all the way. 12gb of ram makes multitasking trivial without anything needing to close in the background. Battery is pretty good for now. Can use any preexisting sim card from another carrier for easy switching. Think i might love this phone better than my gf 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Kairiko Liona

customer_reviews.title: not worth your time
customer_reviews.text: Very sad I received a used phone i paid foe a new phone and not even a charger in the box . I would wait and look foe the new phone coming out from Samsung and buy directly from them worst customer service by amazon i have ever had this has made me leave amazon i have waited a week for my refund this is very very poor service
customer_reviews.author: connie a.

customer_reviews.title: I AM IN THE FUTURE!
customer_reviews.text: I... am amazed. I don't know what else I could possibly say. As someone that's been exclusively using LG's Stylo line for the past 5 years I might as well be in the year 3006 😂 I love this phone!
customer_reviews.author: Dre Jaxson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've always had the "Notes" since the 4. I love this phone. I dont care for the fingerprint reader on the 10 plus compared to the 9. But other than that I love this phone, was definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Stumpf

customer_reviews.title: Good graphics but issues
customer_reviews.text: The phone is decent but with the problems I've had this far there's now the pink line of death apparently and I've only had it for a few months will update after I see how much of a pain the warranty is. update I had to find my own box to ship it back in and secure it they did send me a label I just went to the ups place scanned the code off my phone and they shipped it and sent it back problem was fixed it was fairly painless still a little taken back by faulty parts in a $1300 phone in about 2 ish months after buying it
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely, good smooth transition of apps and data. Came well packaged and looked to be handled carefully witch is always a plus when buying tech especially expensive tech! The camera is beautiful and the stylus works great! Loving this phone and I've only had it for 2 hours! Cant wait to use this phone for the next 2 years lol.
customer_reviews.author: itspieflavor

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This thing will change your life. For better or worse, the choice is yours.
customer_reviews.author: bobbit3126

customer_reviews.title: Previous model is better.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the it doesn't have the Jack for 3.5 mm Head phones, xiomi note 7 has better battery than this. I like to use listen books until I felt sleep now I have to choose between charge my phone or used the earphones. Other than this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jose f solorzano

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!! Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my phone. After my s9 broke I had to temporarily downgrade to an LG and it was awful. This phone hasnt given me any problems. A few apps have acted up but I just close them out and reopen and they work fine. I love the flexibility all I can do on it. I'm sure there is more I havent learned yet but up to this point no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Becky L

customer_reviews.title: Note 10 A Lot Like Note 8 so far!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Note 8 for two years and loved it but was running out of memory and battery was bad. Just got this Note 10 today and so far love it - a little worried about battery but might have gone down fast because of loading everything from old phone. Seems like a good choice!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished but looks untouched
customer_reviews.text: The battery life of the phone is alright, face recognition clips snappy and fast, and the finger print reader is pretty snappy as well. Overall the phone is awesome, especially since its refurbished, it's in greater condition and it got to me early.
customer_reviews.author: joey zaldivar

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ Factory Unlocked Cell Phone with 256 GB (U.S. Warranty), Aura Glow (Silver) Note10+
product_meta.description: Style:Note 10+| Size:256GB| Color:Aura SilverFactory Unlocked cell phone.
feature_bullets: Fast charging, long lasting intelligent power and super speed processing outlast whatever you throw at Note 10 plus
S pen’s newest Evolution gives you the power of air gestures, a remote shutter and playlist button and handwriting to text, all in One Magic wand
With a full set of Pro lenses, super stabilization, live video bokeh and precision audio recording, Note 10+ is a studio in your pocket
Note 10’s nearly bezel less Infinity display gives an immersive, cinematic quality to whatever you’re viewing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,625 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
